#Text=Manage a Beauty Salon
#Text=So you just graduated Cosmetology school , and now want to manage a beauty salon ?
#Text=Well , there 's a couple things you should know even before getting your license !
#Text=It 's not all about your experience , and how great you are at hair , but more in customer service !
#Text=Steps
#Text=Build up a staff .
#Text=You need enough people to cover your open hours , so ideally about 5 stylists .
#Text=Hopefully 2 can work full-time , and the other 3 can work part-time .
#Text=Make sure you have every shift covered .
#Text=If you have salon open Mon - Friday from 10-6 , then have one/two stylist come in the morning and one/two in the afternoon .
#Text=Advertise .
#Text=Advertising in a salon is key to getting business in .
#Text=If you have a newer salon it can be hard finding new customers so running sales like 2 haircuts for $ 20 can be helpful .
#Text=Also , hand out business cards to every customer that you can to increase sales .
#Text=Set up retail options .
#Text=Retail sales in a salon is important because it not only brings in money , but helps with styling client 's hair .
#Text=If you did a color you could suggest that she/he gets a color shampoo to help against fading .
#Text=If you work for a big company
#Text=it is very important to sell retail with services to boost your combo percent .
#Text=You also want to sell if you are making commission off retail .
#Text=Organize a system for tips .
#Text=Usually people tip after a service , so make sure you know what to do with tip money .
#Text=Many salons you can keep your own tips , but some you need to put in a jar and split .
#Text=Handle nightly bank deposits .
#Text=Bank deposits are usually taken every night after closing .
#Text=You might leave $ 100.00 in the drawer , and the rest of the profit will go to the bank in a deposit bag .
#Text=Make sure you hide the bag !
#Text=Never show the bag to the public eye because you are responsible for the money getting to the bank .
#Text=If the drawer is short , or people paid only with credit cards , you may not have a deposit .
#Text=Keep track of customer records .
#Text=Customer records should be stored in a computer or paper to keep up with their recent visit , color , and waxing .
#Text=Also , it should be noted if they get special treatment like they like a 1,2,3 fade or ca n't bend down to the sink area .
#Text=Usually nowadays most salons have a computer with customer information .
#Text=Set up for incoming shipments .
#Text=Some salons get a shipment of product every 1-2 weeks .
#Text=Usually you have to place the correct barcode on the product , and place it on the shelf where it 's supposed to go .
#Text=Keep up with sales .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Coming to work 15 minutes earlier is a great way to get your station prepared before the day starts .
#Text=Make sure you dress , act , and look professional .
#Text=Most salons prefer black or black/white clothing .
#Text=Shoes are important to help your back and shoulders if you stand for long periods of time .
#Text=Do some stretching in between customers .
#Text=The customer is usually always right .
#Text=Not always though .
#Text=Try your best to help a customer , but some people are n't pleased no matter what you do .
#Text=If you are new , you are going to get complaints about haircuts .
#Text=Just make sure you double check to make sure everything is even .
#Text=And , if you do n't know how to do something
#Text=be honest .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Never do hair color or perm ( chemical ) if you do n't know how .
#Text=Even if you do it 's a good idea to review the instructions .
#Text=Avoid the drama of the salon .
#Text=It 's best not to say anything that you would n't want to get back .
#Text=Keep private life , private .
#Text=Keep in mind that hairstylist work long hours plus weekends .
#Text=Also by ourselves sometimes so it 's important to be open minded , but let your boss or district leader know if it 's too much .
